description: This is a Java Spring Boot controller class that provides basic system endpoints such as health check, documentation redirect, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing system endpoints such as health check, documentation redirect, and application information.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message indicating the backend is running.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects clients to the Swagger UI documentation page, preserving the original request URL scheme, host, and port.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Provides a basic health check response, indicating the application is operational.
